bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.summary: DL4J: OOM memory dump is broken?
bug.description:
The only output I'm getting recently on OOMs is as follows: <denchmark-link:https://gist.github.com/AlexDBlack/a1437ed171d95df6a553025377947d81>https://gist.github.com/AlexDBlack/a1437ed171d95df6a553025377947d81</denchmark-link>
Note the <Error generating network memory status information section> I suspect this was due to some recent refactoring (moving a few components to Nd4J) but either way, this needs to be fixed...
